title.narrative: Set-up model dairy and fattening demonstration farm

description.narrative:
Cher-Cher Oda Bultum Farmers Cooperatives Union started with 62 primary cooperatives in 2005. It’s main areas of service are input and output marketing. Currently, the Union has 128 primary cooperatives and it is constantly looking for new ways to improve the value to its members. Initiatives are taken around feed concentrate, coffee roasting, and dairy processing.43.576 farmers are connected to the Union. The business case that the union presented to Agriterra for collaboration is dairy business development in which case the Union is planning to improve the income from members' milk production by collecting and processing the milk and selling it in nearby and distant urban markets. Agriterra agreed to work with the union on three stages. The first stage is to work on activities that have direct impacts on individual farmers, i.e dairy developments activities at household level and unions organizational strengthening.
The plan of 2018 action plan are as follows: 1. Introducing improved variety of dairy cow to the members though AI2. Modernizing farm designed and looking technologies option for the farm3. Digitalizing the financial management system via adopting the Peach-tree computer software4. Improving the Dairy and feed production practices at farmers level
To set-up model dairy husbandry and fattening project to increase the income of Chercher Oda Bultum FCU members from dairy and dairy products
